introduction: This component is used for storing information of guided path configuration.

data.Object: Object name has reflected in read-only format. The object on which the user is configuring the component will appear.
data.Picklist fields: The list of picklist fields for the selected object is listed. Select the picklist field on which the guided path will configure.(Supported data type is Picklist)
data.Preview record: A list of all the records of the object that has been selected. Select a record to see a preview of the component.
data.Static Guided Path: Select the picklist option. Add the guidance message in the instruction.
data.Dynamic Guided Path: In dynamic guided path, select picklist option, add fields and add description/guidance message in instructions for picklist value so user can fill the details before proceeding to next stage.
data.Picklist Value: Select picklist value on which need to give guidance message for proceeding further.
data.Instruction: Add the description/guidance message. The description will display on the record page under the picklist option.
data.Add/Update Fields: Click on Add/Update fields. Field selector will open where users can select the required field and optional field by checking on the checkbox as per their requirement.
